welcomeSection.description: If your business needs a differentiated accessibility solution, you need to know Tina.

expositionSection.subtitle: Get to know our app T.I.N.A Audio Guide
expositionSection.description: Tina - Audio Guide is a visual accessibility application for internal environments, with the purpose of identifying pre -registered Beacons in the Bluetooth system, to use the accessibility feature to alert the user when close to a Beacon.

aboutSection.description: We present T.I.N.A. - Translation, interpretation, navigation and accessibility, a powerful tool, thought and developed to promote the inclusion of people with functional diversity, especially blind or low vision.

appFeatureSection.title: Application with texts and audios translated into 34 languages ​​and pounds available
appFeatureSection.featureDescription: Our app offers text and audio in 34 languages, with plans to expand to over 100 languages ​​in the future, ensuring an even more accessible experience for users around the world.

learnMoreSection.subtitle: Find out more about our project

cards.title: Mobility
cards.paragraph: Autonomy is the key word - T.I.N.A. It transforms the experience of people with functional diversity, offering accurate navigation in various environments, helping users to get around with confidence and independence.

cards.title: Culture
cards.paragraph: The T.I.N.A. It offers detailed descriptions of art exhibitions and exhibitions, allowing blind or low vision people to access enriching and detailed information at cultural events. The application tool and translation of the application also helps to overcome linguistic and communication barriers.

cards.title: Retail
cards.paragraph: Promoting retail accessibility is not just a matter of complying with regulations, but of valuing diversity and providing excellence service to all customers. The implementation of T.I.N.A. demonstrates a commitment to inclusion and social responsibility.

pilares.title: Pillars
pilares.description: At Biomob, we seek inclusive and accessible environments for all, respecting diversity and ensuring equality.

cards.title: Accessibility
cards.description: We make environments, products and services usable by all, respecting and welcoming the differences. We eliminate barriers and guarantee equal access and opportunity.

cards.title: Diversity
cards.description: Gender diversity, respect for freedom of beliefs and religions, priority to the elderly, pregnant women, egresses of the prison system, refugees and unbeaten groups.

cards.title: Inclusion
cards.description: Biomob ensures that all people, regardless of their differences, have equal opportunities and feel truly valued.

tenCardSection.title: INCLUSION
tenCardSection.description: The ten goals for inclusion promote a fair and equitable environment, ensuring full participation of all in society.
